about_the_game:
Enjoy the thrilling police investigation "Criminal Archives: Alphabetic Murders DLC"! Mini-games, puzzles and hidden objects await you! Try to find all the hidden objects in the extra locations!
This additional content contains three new locations! In the main game, explore the sisters' room, and visit Arnold's workshop to find notes that are sure to have the information you need! In the bonus one, you'll have to explore Fred's study!

In the new locations you can learn new details about the characters, uncover all the secrets that will help you fix the situation. Unlock new achievements after completing all quests!

🔍 VISIT ARNOLD'S WORKSHOP!
There's definitely something personal to be found in this room, in addition to the workroom! It's up to you to figure it all out by thoroughly exploring Arnold's workshop.

🔍 EXPLORE THE SISTERS ROOM!
Boxes. cushions, dolls, toys - these can all be found in a typical girl's room. But there's more... Something more down to earth to help you get to know your sisters even better!

🔍 TAKE A LOOK AROUND FRED'S STUDY!
Here you can find so many entertaining things that hold their secrets! Solve all the puzzles and find all the hidden items! Maybe that's what will help you find out what was troubling Fred?

Are you ready to find all the carefully hidden objects and solve all the puzzles? Start your journey and discover all the achievements!
